TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ControlAdapter extends System.Object

summary.span: 自定义附加了适配器的派生控件的呈现，以修改特定浏览器的默认标记或行为，是所有控件适配器都可以继承的基类。

span.span: Customizes rendering for the derived control to which the adapter is attached, to modify the default markup or behavior for specific browsers, and is the base class from which all control adapters inherit.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件适配器是可重写某些组件类方法和事件在其执行生命周期，以允许浏览器或特定于标记的处理。Control adapters are components that override certain class methods and events in its execution lifecycle to allow browser or markup-specific handling. .NET Framework 映射的单个派生的控件适配器为每个客户端请求的对象。The .NET Framework maps a single derived control adapter to a object for each client request. 适配器修改特定浏览器或浏览器的类的控件，或作为针对某些功能的任意筛选器。An adapter modifies a control for a specific browser or class of browsers or acts as an arbitrary filter on some capability. 通常由浏览器使用 （例如，XHTML 或 HTML 3.2） 的标记语言定义适配器。Typically the adapter is defined by the markup language that the browser uses (for example, XHTML or HTML 3.2). 在呈现行为适应性大部分可以封装在派生自的专用类类。Much of the adaptability in rendering behavior can be encapsulated in the specialized classes that derive from the class. 因此，很可能单个适配器可以用于大量的浏览器类行为，或者包括在适应性类无法进行不必要的使用控件适配器。Therefore, it is likely that a single adapter can be used for a number of browser class behaviors or that inclusion of the adaptability in the classes could make the use of a control adapter unnecessary. 控件类适配器适用于从该类，继承的所有控件，除非存在更多专用的适配器。An adapter for a control class applies to all controls that inherit from that class, unless more specialized adapters are present. 例如，为适配器类可以用于所有`Validator`对象。For example, an adapter for the class can be used for all `Validator` objects. 适配器通常不会继承直接从类，但特定于目标的适配器的一个基类，后者可提供其他功能特定于控件类型和目标浏览器或所需特定呈现。Adapters typically do not inherit directly from the class, but from one of the target-specific adapter base classes that provide additional functionality specific to the control type and target browser or the particular rendering required. 控件本身不一定需要适配器。Controls themselves do not necessarily require an adapter. 如果控件通过组合扩展，通常子控件适配器已经足够。If controls are extended through composition, generally the child control adapters are sufficient. 每个控件都有显式映射到适配器穿过.browser 定义文件。Each control has explicit mappings to adapters through the .browser definition files. 因此，任何访问到属性使用从适配器到控件的映射执行查找的浏览器定义文件中提取的对象。Thus, any access to the property uses the object extracted from the browser definition files to perform the lookup for the mapping of the adapter to control. 在处理期间，.NET Framework 截获对可能目标特定的控件可重写方法的调用。During processing, the .NET Framework intercepts calls to the overridable methods of a control that could be target-specific. 如果附加了控件适配器，.NET Framework 调用关联的适配器方法。If a control adapter is attached, the .NET Framework calls the associated adapter methods. 适配器执行通过控件的呈现方法。The adapter performs rendering for the control through the method. 如果重写，可能不应调用基类实现，它执行调用返回因为方法。If overridden, potentially should not call the base class implementation because that performs a call back on the method. 这可能会导致发生两次，一次适配器进行一次的控件的呈现。This might cause the rendering to occur twice, once by the adapter and once by the control. 基方法调用回调的控件的方法。The base method calls back on the method of the control. 因此，如果你重写，你不应调用基类实现，除非你实现的呈现以及由的控件。Thus, if you override , you should not call the base class implementation unless the rendering you implement is in addition to that provided by of the control. 你必须确保.NET Framework 执行截获，适配器的子控件。You must ensure that the .NET Framework performs interception for adapters of the child controls. 你可以执行此操作通过调用基方法，以便调用方法的控件，从你重写。You can do this by calling the base method, which calls the method of the control, from your override. 和立即之前和之后 （分别） 控件调用，方法调用该控件的方法。The and methods are called by the control immediately before and after (respectively) the control calls the method. 如果预和后呈现唯一的浏览器特定处理任务需要，使用和可能使用户无需重写。If pre- and post-rendering are the only browser-specific processing tasks required, using and might make it unnecessary to override . 默认行为和方法是调用方法相应。The default behavior of the and methods is to call the corresponding methods of the . 若要维护其自己的状态信息，控件适配器可以重写， ， ，和方法。To maintain its own state information, a control adapter can override the , , , and methods. ， ，和保存和加载，分别私有控件和视图状态时，将调用。, , , and are called when the private control and view states are saved and loaded, respectively. ， ， ，和基方法调用回调相应类方法。The , , , and base methods call back on the corresponding class methods. 因此，其中的任何方法已重写必须调用其基方法; 否则，事件与类方法将不会引发。Thus, any of these methods that are overridden must call their base methods; otherwise, the event associated with the class method will not be raised. 控件和适配器 （可选） 实现和接口。Controls and adapters optionally implement the and interfaces. .NET Framework 确定是否存在的适配器和适配器是否实现这些接口。The .NET Framework determines whether an adapter exists and whether the adapter implements these interfaces. 如果已存在，应重写适配器， ，和方法，根据需要。If it does, the adapter should override the , , and methods, as necessary. 如果回发数据无法识别与适配器中，则必须重新调用上要对其进行处理的控件。If the postback data is not recognized in the adapter, it must call back on the control to process it. 后续的事件处理程序还必须调用返回在控件上。Subsequent event handlers also must call back on the control.

block.para:
继承自类，需要常规的适配器的功能的控件应该具有基类，名为模式中的相应适配器 (例如， )。When you inherit from the class, a control that requires general adapter functionality should have a corresponding adapter base class, named in the pattern (for example, ). 适配器应至少返回强类型实例的控制通过其属性。The adapter should at a minimum return a strongly-typed instance of the control through its property.
1. 给定的控件类型和标记语言应模式中名为控件适配器 (例如， )。Control adapters for a given control type and markup language should be named in the pattern (for example, ). 应在实现控件的适配器子命名空间。Adapters for a control should be implemented in an subnamespace.
控件适配器应从相应的基类继承，并遵循相同的继承模型为控件。Control adapters should inherit from the appropriate base class and follow the same inheritance model as the control. 例如，从继承的控件适配器应该继承基类类或相关类。For example, an adapter for a control inheriting from the base class should inherit from either the class or the relevant class.
应为所有配置.browser 文件中的设备节点下的专用控件定义任何专用的适配器。Any specialized adapters should be defined for the specialized control under all of the device nodes in configuration .browser files.
正确实现的控件不应假定附加了适配器，或附加的适配器实现特定接口。A properly implemented control should not assume that an adapter is attached, or that the attached adapter implements a specific interface. 相反，它应检查这些之前调用。Instead, it should check for these before calling.
可以模拟如重写在控件中，受保护的事件方法方法。It is possible to simulate overriding protected event methods in the control, such as the method of the . 首先，创建一种适配器类与OnClick方法。First, create an adapter class with an OnClick method. 然后创建一个新的控件派生自，并重写方法。Then create a new control derived from and override the method. 重写方法调用OnClick的适配器的方法。The overriden method calls the OnClick method of the adapter. 该适配器对象可用于通过受保护属性类。The adapter object is available through the protected property of the class. 的控件的属性是时没有任何关联的适配器，因此任何代码应为该条件在调用之前检查的适配器的方法。The property of the control is when there is no associated adapter, so any code should check for that condition before calling methods of the adapter.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 内部构造此适配器时它会创建相应对象。The .NET Framework internally constructs this adapter when it creates the corresponding object.

span.span: The containing methods to render the target-specific output.

summary.span: 在呈现控件前调用。

span.span: Called prior to the rendering of a control.

summary.span: 在派生的 adapter 类中，生成特定目标需要但 HTML 浏览器不需要的开始标记。

span.span: In a derived adapter class, generates opening tags that are required by a specific target but not needed by HTML browsers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 之前调用方法方法，并用于执行特定于目标的预处理之前的控件的呈现。The method is called just before the method, and is used to perform target-specific preprocessing before the rendering of the control. 使用方法结合方法，以确保开始标记与结束标记的一致性。Use the method in combination with the method to ensure opening and closing tag consistency.

para.span: 继承自类，基方法调用方法。

span.span: When you inherit from the class, the base method calls the method.

para.span: 因此，重写方法应调用基方法，仅当其处理为中而非取代，后者而不是，方法。

span.span: Thus, overrides of the method should call the base method only if its processing is in addition to, rather than instead of, the method.

MemberSignature.Value: protected System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilities Browser { get; }
.property instance class System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilities Browser
Protected ReadOnly Property Browser As HttpBrowserCapabilities
protected: property System::Web::HttpBrowserCapabilities ^ Browser { System::Web::HttpBrowserCapabilities ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取对发出当前 HTTP 请求的客户端的浏览器功能的引用。

span.span: Gets a reference to the browser capabilities of the client making the current HTTP request.

value.span: 一个 ，指定客户端浏览器和标记功能。

span.span: An specifying client browser and markup capabilities.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A对象确定从客户端浏览器功能返回的对象属性。A object determines the client browser capabilities from the object that is returned by the property. 这使对象浏览器特定标记呈现，或者修改的行为。This enables the object to render browser-specific markup or otherwise modify the behavior of the . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来访问请求的浏览器的详细信息。The following code example shows how to use the property to access the details of the requesting browser. 在此示例中，代码检查以确定是否浏览器是否与 JavaScript 兼容，并随后允许开发人员可以在这种情况下呈现自定义的输出。In this example, the code checks to determine whether the browser is compatible with JavaScript, and then allows the developer to render customized output in that case. [!code-cpp[ControlAdapter_Browser#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlAdapter_Browser/CPP/controladapter_browser.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ControlAdapter_Browser#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlAdapter_Browser/CS/controladapter_browser.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ControlAdapter_Browser#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlAdapter_Browser/VB/controladapter_browser.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: protected System.Web.UI.Control Control { get; }
.property instance class System.Web.UI.Control Control
Protected ReadOnly Property Control As Control
protected: property System::Web::UI::Control ^ Control { System::Web::UI::Control ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取对附加了此控件适配器的控件的引用。

span.span: Gets a reference to the control to which this control adapter is attached.
The to which this is attached.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当派生的控件适配器附加到控件时，.NET Framework 调用而不是控件成员某些适配器成员。When a derived control adapter is attached to a control, the .NET Framework calls certain adapter members instead of the control members. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从自定义控件从类，然后再创建继承自相应适配器类。The following code example shows how to derive a custom control from the class, and then create a corresponding adapter that inherits from the class. 适配器重写属性并返回到控件的强类型引用。The adapter overrides the property and returns a strongly-typed reference to the control. [!code-cpp[ControlAdapter.Control#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlAdapter.Control/CPP/controladapter.control.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ControlAdapter.Control#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlAdapter.Control/CS/controladapter.control.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ControlAdapter.Control#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlAdapter.Control/VB/controladapter.control.vb#1)]

para.span: 继承自类，在最低限度上，则应实现属性以返回该控件的强类型实例，如示例部分中所示。

span.span: When you inherit from the class, at a minimum, you should implement a property to return a strongly-typed instance of the control, as shown in the Example section.

summary.span: 为复合控件创建特定于目标的子控件。

span.span: Creates the target-specific child controls for a composite control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果没有派生的控件适配器附加到对象和方法被重写，重写调用而不是方法。If there is a derived control adapter attached to a object and the method is overridden, the override is called instead of the method. 因此，可以用于创建特定于目标的子控件集。Thus, can be used to create a target-specific child control set. 有关组合控件，创建一个新的控件的详细信息，请参阅[复合控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fb174677-d845-467c-8bf3-cc096b2490b0)。For more information about combining controls to create a new control, see [Composite Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fb174677-d845-467c-8bf3-cc096b2490b0).

para.span: 如果创建继承类并重写方法，则不要不基方法，除非你想要将控件添加到那些创建由基方法的调用。

span.span: If you create an inheriting class and override the method, do not call the base method unless you want to add controls to those created by the base method.

para.span: 否则你可以创建两个集的子控件。

span.span: Otherwise you could create two sets of child controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法调用紧随其后方法，并用于执行特定于目标的后处理后的控件的呈现。The method is called just after the method, and is used to perform target-specific postprocessing after the rendering of the control. 使用方法结合方法，以确保开始标记与结束标记的一致性。Use the method in combination with the method to ensure opening and closing tag consistency.

para.span: 继承自类，基方法调用方法。

span.span: When you inherit from the class, the base method calls the method.

para.span: 因此，重写方法应调用基方法，仅当其处理为中而非取代，后者而不是，方法。

span.span: Thus, overrides of the method should call the base method only if its processing is in addition to, rather than instead of, the method.

protected public: virtual void LoadAdapterControlState(System::Object ^ state);

param.name: state
param.span: 一个 ，其中包含适配器的控件状态信息作为 。

span.span: An that contains the adapter's control state information as a .

summary.span: 加载适配器控件状态信息，该信息由 在以前请求与此控件适配器关联的控件所驻留的页时保存。

span.span: Loads adapter control state information that was saved by during a previous request to the page where the control associated with this control adapter resides.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件状态是所需即使禁用了视图状态的基本状态信息。Control state is the essential state information needed even if view state is disabled. 当适配器需要维护其自己的控件状态信息时，它可以重写和方法。When an adapter needs to maintain its own control state information, it can override the and methods. 适配器可能需要时有需要具有多个请求，独立于关联控件的状态之间保持的状态的功能保持控件状态信息。An adapter might need to maintain control state information when there are features that need to have state maintained across requests, independent from the state of the associated control. 例如，大型的文本显示和一组组成的复合控件控件可能呈现为台式计算机浏览器上的单一视图。For example, a composite control consisting of a large textual display and a group of controls might render as a single view on desktop computer browsers. 在其他浏览器，它可能会拆分其呈现-文本显示和另一个用于的单选按钮组的一个视图。On other browsers, it might split its rendering—one view for the textual display and the other for the radio button group. 适配器需要维护其自己的特定于目标的信息，有关当前处于活动状态的视图。The adapter would need to maintain its own target-specific information about the currently active view. 方法之后，立即调用方法，请在`LoadState`生命周期阶段。The method is called immediately after the method, in the `LoadState` lifecycle stage. 适配器控件状态是分开的并且除了该控件的控件状态。The adapter control state is separate and in addition to the control state of the control.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal virtual void LoadAdapterViewState (object state);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void LoadAdapterViewState(object state) cil managed
Protected Friend Overridable Sub LoadAdapterViewState (state As Object)
protected public: virtual void LoadAdapterViewState(System::Object ^ state);

param.name: state
param.span: 一个 ，其中包含适配器视图的状态信息作为 。

span.span: An that contains the adapter view state information as a .

summary.span: 加载适配器视图状态信息，该信息由 在以前请求与此控件适配器关联的控件所驻留的页时保存。

span.span: Loads adapter view state information that was saved by during a previous request to the page where the control associated with this control adapter resides.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当适配器需要维护其自己的视图状态信息时，它可以重写和方法。When an adapter needs to maintain its own view state information, it can override the and methods. 适配器需要必须在请求中独立于关联控件的视图状态之间保持的数据时维护视图状态信息。An adapter needs to maintain view state information when there is data that must be maintained across requests, independent from the view state of the associated control. 例如，台式计算机浏览器上的网格控件可能呈现为单个视图的行和列的值。For example, a grid control on desktop computer browsers might render as a single view of rows and columns of values. 在其他浏览器，它可能会拆分为多个单独的视图，例如的行和单个行的详细信息列表其呈现。On other browsers, it might split its rendering into multiple separate views, such as a list of rows and details of a single row. 适配器需要保持视图状态中不是当前处于活动状态的视图的数据。The adapter would need to maintain the data for the views that are not currently active in view state. 方法立即之前调用中的方法`LoadState`生命周期阶段。The method is called immediately before the method in the `LoadState` lifecycle stage. 适配器视图状态是分开进行，并且除了该控件的视图状态。The adapter view state is separate and in addition to the view state of the control.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal virtual void OnInit (EventArgs e);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnInit(class System.EventArgs e) cil managed

span.span: An that contains the event data.

summary.span: 重写关联控件的 方法。

span.span: Overrides the method for the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果没有适配器连接到对象和方法被重写，重写方法调用而不是方法。If there is an adapter attached to a object and the method is overridden, the override method is called instead of the method. 重写来执行特定于目标的处理中`Initialize`控件生命周期的阶段。Override to perform target-specific processing in the `Initialize` stage of the control lifecycle. 通常，这些都是创建一个控件时，将执行的函数。Typically, these are functions that are performed when a control is created. ## Examples 下面的代码示例派生的自定义控件适配器从类。The following code sample derives a custom control adapter from the class. 然后，它将替代方法以在关联的控件上设置属性并调用基方法，以完成控件初始化。It then overrides the method to set a property on the associated control and call the base method to complete the control initialization. [!code-cpp[ControlAdapter_OnInit#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlAdapter_OnInit/CPP/controladapter_oninit.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ControlAdapter_OnInit#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlAdapter_OnInit/CS/controladapter_oninit.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ControlAdapter_OnInit#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlAdapter_OnInit/VB/controladapter_oninit.vb#1)]

para.span: 继承自类，适配器并重写方法，适配器必须调用相应的基类方法，后者反过来调用方法。

span.span: When you inherit from the class and the adapter overrides the method, the adapter must call the corresponding base class method, which in turn calls the method.

para.span: 如果不调用方法，不会引发事件。

span.span: If the method is not called, the event will not be raised.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果没有适配器连接到对象和方法被重写，重写方法调用而不是方法。If there is an adapter attached to a object and the method is overridden, the override method is called instead of the method. 重写方法来执行特定于目标的处理中`Load`控件生命周期的阶段。Override the method to perform target-specific processing in the `Load` stage of the control lifecycle. 通常，这些都是应为每个客户端请求执行的函数。Typically, these are functions that should be performed for each client request.

para.span: 继承自类，适配器并重写方法，适配器必须调用相应的基类方法，后者反过来调用方法。

span.span: When you inherit from the class and the adapter overrides the method, the adapter must call the corresponding base class method, which in turn calls the method.

para.span: 如果不调用，不会引发事件。

span.span: If is not called, the event will not be raised.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal virtual void OnPreRender (EventArgs e);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnPreRender(class System.EventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Friend Overridable Sub OnPreRender (e As EventArgs)
protected public: virtual void OnPreRender(EventArgs ^ e);

span.span: An that contains the event data.

summary.span: 重写关联控件的 方法。

span.span: Overrides the method for the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果没有适配器连接到对象和方法被重写，重写方法调用而不是方法。If there is an adapter attached to a object and the method is overridden, the override method is called instead of the method. 重写方法来执行特定于目标的处理中`PreRender`控件生命周期的阶段。Override the method to perform target-specific processing in the `PreRender` stage of the control lifecycle. 通常，这些都是紧跟呈现控制输出的函数。Typically, these are functions that immediately precede rendering of the control output.

para.span: 继承自类，适配器并重写方法，适配器必须调用相应的基类方法，后者反过来调用方法。

span.span: When you inherit from the class and the adapter overrides the method, the adapter must call the corresponding base class method, which in turn calls the method.

para.span: 如果不调用方法，不会引发事件。

span.span: If the method is not called, the event will not be raised.

summary.span: 重写关联控件的 方法。

span.span: Overrides the method for the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果没有适配器连接到对象和方法被重写，重写方法调用而不是方法。If there is an adapter attached to a object and the method is overridden, the override method is called instead of the method. 重写方法来执行特定于目标的处理操作`Unload`控件生命周期的阶段。Override the method to do target-specific processing in the `Unload` stage of the control lifecycle. 通常情况下，它们是位于之前处理控件的清理函数。Typically, these are cleanup functions that precede disposition of the control.

para.span: 继承自类，适配器并重写方法，适配器必须调用相应的基类方法，后者反过来调用方法。

span.span: When you inherit from the class and the adapter overrides the method, the adapter must call the corresponding base class method, which in turn calls the method.

para.span: 如果不调用，不会引发事件。

span.span: If is not called, the event will not be raised.

span.span: Gets a reference to the page where the control associated with this adapter resides.

value.span: 用于与当前 关联的控件所在的页的 。

span.span: A for the page where the control associated with the current is situated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性提供访问权限对象对象其中关联与当前对象对象的权限。The property provides access to the object for the object where the object associated with the current object is situated. 属性可用来访问页级别适配器，如可应用于页面上的多个控件类型的公共目标特定函数的其他项。The property can be used to access other items at the page adapter level, such as common target-specific functions that could apply to several control types on the page.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal virtual void Render (System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter writer);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Render(class System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter writer) cil managed
Protected Friend Overridable Sub Render (writer As HtmlTextWriter)
protected public: virtual void Render(System::Web::UI::HtmlTextWriter ^ writer);

param.name: writer
param.span: 用于呈现特定于目标的输出的 。

span.span: The to use to render the target-specific output.

summary.span: 为附加了控件适配器的控件生成目标特定的标记。

span.span: Generates the target-specific markup for the control to which the control adapter is attached.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重写方法来生成特定于目标的标记将发送到客户端浏览器。Override the method to generate target-specific markup to send to the client browser. 代替了调用方法方法如果对象附加到对象。The method is called in place of the method if a object is attached to a object.

para.span: 继承自类，基方法调用方法。

span.span: When you inherit from the class, the base method calls the method.

para.span: 因此，重写方法应调用基方法，仅当其处理为中而非取代，后者而不是，方法。

span.span: Thus, overrides of the method should call the base method only if its processing is in addition to, rather than instead of, the method.

para.span: 对于复合控件，适配器开发人员必须确保呈现子控件。

span.span: For a composite control, the adapter developer must ensure that the child controls are rendered.

para.span: 如果方法使子控件呈现，但不会生成标记，它可能适用于方法来调用其基的方法。

span.span: If the method causes the child controls to be rendered but does not generate markup, it might be appropriate for the method to call its base method.

para.span: 如果子控件的特定于目标的呈现有必要，应实现适配器方法并且调用方法从方法。

span.span: If target-specific rendering of the child controls is necessary, the adapter should implement the method and call the method from the method.

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual void RenderChildren (System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter writer);
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void RenderChildren(class System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter writer) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub RenderChildren (writer As HtmlTextWriter)
protected: virtual void RenderChildren(System::Web::UI::HtmlTextWriter ^ writer);

param.name: writer
param.span: 用于呈现特定于目标的输出的 。

span.span: The to use to render the target-specific output.

summary.span: 为附加了控件适配器的复合控件中的子控件生成特定于目标的标记。

span.span: Generates the target-specific markup for the child controls in a composite control to which the control adapter is attached.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重写方法需要生成目标特定于标记的子控件一套复合控件，此外到各个子控件的标记时。Override the method when it is necessary to generate target-specific markup for the child control set of a composite control, in addition to the markup for the individual child controls.

para.span: 继承自复合控件，适配器开发人员的类，必须确保能呈现子控件。

span.span: When you inherit from the class, for a composite control, the adapter developer must ensure that the child controls are rendered.

para.span: 如果适配器重写方法，则应调用方法的重写方法。

span.span: If the adapter overrides the method, it should call the method from an override of the method.

para.span: 如果方法使子控件呈现，但本身不会生成标记，它可能适用于方法来调用与其基方法，调用该方法方法，而不是实现的替代方法。

span.span: If the method causes the child controls to be rendered but itself does not generate markup, it might be appropriate for the method to call its base method, which calls the method, instead of implementing an override for the method.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal virtual object SaveAdapterControlState ();
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig newslot virtual instance object SaveAdapterControlState() cil managed
Protected Friend Overridable Function SaveAdapterControlState () As Object
protected public: virtual System::Object ^ SaveAdapterControlState();

summary.span: 保存控件适配器的控件状态信息。

span.span: Saves control state information for the control adapter.

returns.span: 一个 ，其中包含适配器的控件状态信息作为 。

span.span: An that contains the adapter's control state information as a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件状态是所需即使禁用了视图状态的基本状态信息。Control state is the essential state information needed even if view state is disabled. 当适配器需要维护其自己的控件状态信息时，它可以重写和方法。When an adapter needs to maintain its own control state information, it can override the and methods. 适配器可能需要时有需要具有多个请求，独立于关联控件的状态之间保持的状态的功能保持控件状态信息。An adapter might need to maintain control state information when there are features that need to have state maintained across requests, independent from the state of the associated control. 例如，大型的文本显示和一组组成的复合控件控件可能呈现为台式计算机浏览器上的单一视图。For example, a composite control consisting of a large textual display and a group of controls might render as a single view on desktop computer browsers. 在其他浏览器，它可能会拆分其呈现-文本显示和另一个用于的单选按钮组的一个视图。On other browsers, it might split its rendering—one view for the textual display and the other for the radio button group. 适配器需要维护其自己的特定于目标的信息，有关当前处于活动状态的视图。The adapter would need to maintain its own target-specific information about the currently active view. 方法之后，立即调用中的方法`SaveState`生命周期阶段。The method is called immediately after the method in the `SaveState` lifecycle stage. 适配器控件状态是分开的并且除了该控件的控件状态。The adapter control state is separate and in addition to the control state of the control.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal virtual object SaveAdapterViewState ();
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig newslot virtual instance object SaveAdapterViewState() cil managed
Protected Friend Overridable Function SaveAdapterViewState () As Object
protected public: virtual System::Object ^ SaveAdapterViewState();

summary.span: 保存控件适配器的视图状态信息。

span.span: Saves view state information for the control adapter.

returns.span: 一个 ，其中包含适配器视图的状态信息作为 。

span.span: An that contains the adapter view state information as a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当适配器需要维护其自己的视图状态信息时，它可以重写和方法。When an adapter needs to maintain its own view state information, it can override the and methods. 适配器需要必须在请求中独立于控件的关联的视图状态之间保持的数据时维护视图状态信息。An adapter needs to maintain view state information when there is data that must be maintained across requests, independent from the associated view state of the control. 例如，台式计算机浏览器上的网格控件可能呈现为单个视图的行和列的值。For example, a grid control on desktop computer browsers might render as a single view of rows and columns of values. 在其他浏览器，它可能会拆分为多个单独的视图，例如的行和单个行的详细信息列表其呈现。On other browsers, it might split its rendering into multiple separate views, such as a list of rows and details of a single row. 适配器需要保持视图状态中不是当前处于活动状态的视图的数据。The adapter would need to maintain the data for the views that are not currently active in view state. 方法立即之前调用中的方法`SaveState`生命周期阶段。The method is called immediately before the method in the `SaveState` lifecycle stage. 适配器视图状态是分开进行，并且除了该控件的视图状态。The adapter view state is separate and in addition to the view state of the control.
